osvSchema.details: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Addon JD Flusity 'Social block links' module of flusity-CMS v2.33 allows attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML via a crafted payload injected into the Profile Name text field.

description_data.value: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Addon JD Flusity 'Social block links' module of flusity-CMS v2.33 allows attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML via a crafted payload injected into the Profile Name text field.

descriptions.value: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Addon JD Flusity 'Social block links' module of flusity-CMS v2.33 allows attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML via a crafted payload injected into the Profile Name text field.

Una vulnerabilidad de Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) en Addon JD Flusity 'Social block links' module of flusity-CMS v2.33 permite a los atacantes ejecutar script web o HTML arbitrario a través de un payload manipulado inyectado en el campo de texto Nombre del perfil.
